definition: abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]

sentences.english: When he saw me, he took off his hat with an air of gorgeous servility .
sentences.chinese: 他看到我，脫掉帽子，滿臉都是阿諛的神色。

sentences.english: Jack bootlicked to get a promotion;
sentences.chinese: 傑克阿諛奉承以得到晉升。

sentences.english: A wise man is superior to flattery.
sentences.chinese: 一個智者是不會被阿諛奉承所迷惑的。

sentences.english: I cannot be your friend and your flatterer too.
sentences.chinese: 我不能既是你的朋友，而又對你阿諛奉承。

sentences.english: A great man is above flattery.
sentences.chinese: 一個偉大的人是不屑於阿諛奉承的。

sentences.english: The flattery monacal is a philatelic.
sentences.chinese: 那個阿諛的修道士是個集郵愛好者。

sentences.english: Flattery brings friends, but the truth begets enmity.
sentences.chinese: 阿諛奉承也許能交到朋友，但真相會引起憎恨。

sentences.english: I could not be ywe friend or ywe eventerer too.
sentences.chinese: 朋友無所不能阿諛奉承。
她以阿諛奉承博得寵幸。

sentences.english: Sycophancy was the device of the least trustworthy.
sentences.chinese: 阿諛奉承之輩最不可靠。

sentences.english: However, the Sagittarius woman is not the one who believes in flattery.
sentences.chinese: 但是，射手座的女人卻不相信阿諛奉承這一套。

sentences.english: He despised people who were lavish with their praises .
sentences.chinese: 他看不起那些阿諛奉承的人。

sentences.english: The implication is to curry favour, benefits from fish.
sentences.chinese: 阿諛奉承，其言外之意就是要從中撈取好處。

sentences.english: Forum-Ergebnisse für "I cannot be your friend and your flatterer too."
sentences.chinese: 我不能同時是你的朋友又是你的阿諛奉承者。

definition: scramble for power and profit (idiom); power struggle
the State of Qǐ in modern Qǐ county 杞縣|杞县, Henan (c. 1500-445 BC), a small vassal state of Shang and Western Zhou for most of its existence
to die or be martyred for a noble cause/to be faithful unto death
to act in collusion (idiom); in cahoots with/villains will look after one another
see 呂洞賓|吕洞宾[Lu:3 Dong4 bin1]
to hate and resent/angry and full of grievances
